title: 3D HD Watch Face
summary: A minimalistic Digital watchface showing only what's important!
developerAddress:
83 Roseville Road
Office 20 Suite: #99589
Leeds, West Yorkshire
LS8 5DT
description: By installing "3D HD Watch Face" you'll get the watch face on your wrist and a companion app on your mobile device which will let you configure the watch face.Some of the options and features are:  ✔ Minimalistic design & Stylish look ✔ Phone disconnection vibration ✔ Different watch vibration modes ✔ Option to let your wrist vibrate every hour like a cuckoo clock ✔ Ability to customize colors using different blending modesSupported devices: ✔ Motorola Moto 360 ✔ LG G Watch ✔ LG G Watch R ✔ Samsung Gear LIVE (not for Gear or Gear 2) ✔ Sony SmartWatch 3 ✔ Asus ZenWatchDoes NOT WORK on Samsung GEAR, GEAR 2 and smart watches with other operating systems like Tizen.	Never leave your phone behind ANYMORE!!!With a single tap you can enable the option to let your wrist vibrate whenever the connection between your phone and your Android Wear device gets disconnected.How to install: - Long press on your Android Wear device and select this watchface from the carousel. - You can also select our watchface from the Android Wear App.If you don't see it in the carousel: - Wait a minute to let your Android Wear device to sync. - Lauch Android Wear app, tap on the gear in the upper right corner and tap on "Resync apps" and wait for resync.Visit our other watchfaces and apps at: http://goo.gl/kxZzQAHave an idea on how to improve the app?Let us know by contacting us and we'll do our best to make you happy.
descriptionHTML:
By installing "3D HD Watch Face" you'll get the watch face on your wrist and a companion app on your mobile device which will let you configure the watch face.

Some of the options and features are:
✔ Minimalistic design & Stylish look
✔ Phone disconnection vibration
✔ Different watch vibration modes
✔ Option to let your wrist vibrate every hour like a cuckoo clock
✔ Ability to customize colors using different blending modes

Supported devices:
✔ Motorola Moto 360
✔ LG G Watch
✔ LG G Watch R
✔ Samsung Gear LIVE (not for Gear or Gear 2)
✔ Sony SmartWatch 3
✔ Asus ZenWatch

Does NOT WORK on Samsung GEAR, GEAR 2 and smart watches with other operating systems like Tizen.

Never leave your phone behind ANYMORE!!!

With a single tap you can enable the option to let your wrist vibrate whenever the connection between your phone and your Android Wear device gets disconnected.

How to install:
- Long press on your Android Wear device and select this watchface from the carousel.
- You can also select our watchface from the Android Wear App.

If you don't see it in the carousel:
- Wait a minute to let your Android Wear device to sync.
- Lauch Android Wear app, tap on the gear in the upper right corner and tap on "Resync apps" and wait for resync.

Visit our other watchfaces and apps at: http://goo.gl/kxZzQA

Have an idea on how to improve the app?Let us know by contacting us and we'll do our best to make you happy.
comments: Marred by advertising Useful, quirky.  Will be uninstalling due to pop up ads on my watch from this app
Can't install on Android Wear 2.0 for some reason. Just won't appear.
I like the easy transfer of watchfaces.***"

This is exactly what I want in a watch face I've been searching for a simple glance friendly watch face with the time, weather, date, and battery percentage for my phone and my watch. this ticks all boxes and I'm very pleased.... My only request is for more color options (black would be really nice)
